text:
Bappusaheb Sadashiv Bhosale (Marathi:बाप्पूसाहेब सदाशिव भोसले) (born 26 June 1977) is an Indian politician, and social activist hails from Pune. He is a Founder President of Dalit Panther of India, a social organization that seeks to combat caste discrimination. Bhosale is also an ambassador of UNFFT.
Early life and background.
Bappusaheb Bhosale was born on 26th June 1977 in Mumbai, Maharashtra. His father Sadashiv Bhosale was a co-founder of Dalit Panther of India.
